com.mapquest.android.maps
Class MapView.LayoutParams

java.lang.Object
  android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams
      com.mapquest.android.maps.MapView.LayoutParams
Enclosing class:
MapView
public static class MapView.LayoutParams
extends android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams

Sets the layout options for child views. A child view can either be positioned with respect to View(MODE_VIEW) or with respect to Map (MODE_MAP) currently shown in the View.

Field Summary
 int alignment
          Specifies the alignment options of the view with relative to the point.
static int BOTTOM
          Aligns the bottom of the view to the point.
static int BOTTOM_CENTER
          Horizontally aligns the view's bottom and vertically aligns view's center to the point

          Aligns the center of the view to the point.

          Specifies the position mode of child view.

          Sets the position of the child view with respect to view.

public static final int MODE_VIEW

See Also:
alignment, Constant Field Values

alignment

public int alignment
Specifies the alignment options of the view with relative to the point. Custom alignment option can be specified by combining one or more alignment options using bitwise OR (|) operator.

mode

public int mode
Specifies the position mode of child view.

point

public GeoPoint point
Geographical coordinate to use for positioning the child view when mode is MODE_MAP

x

public int x
the x location to position child relative to the view.

y

public int y
the y location to position child relative to the view.

Constructor Detail

MapView.LayoutParams

public MapView.LayoutParams(android.content.Context context,
                            android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
Constructs the LayoutParams instance from attribute set Support attributes: android:x x coordinate in the screen to place the view android:y y coordinate in the screen to place the view android:geoPoint geographical coordinates to place the view. Must be specified in the format latitude degrees, longitude degrees

Parameters:
context -
attrs - attribute set containing the layout options

MapView.LayoutParams

public MapView.LayoutParams(android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams source)
Constructs the LayoutParam instance from the source. Sets x, y, location, mode, alignment options from source, if source is an instance of MapView.LayoutParams,

Parameters:
source -

MapView.LayoutParams

public MapView.LayoutParams(int width,
                            int height,
                            GeoPoint point,
                            int alignment)
Constructs LayoutParams instance with specified width, height, location and alignment options. The child view is positioned relative to the map currently displayed in MapView.

Parameters:
width - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
height - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
point - geographical coordinates to place the view relative to the map
alignment - one or more alignment options to use

MapView.LayoutParams

public MapView.LayoutParams(int width,
                            int height,
                            GeoPoint point,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int alignment)
Constructs LayoutParams instance with specified width, height, location with additional offsets and alignment options.

Parameters:
width - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
height - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
point - geographical coordinates to place the view relative to the map
x - x offset that must be applied for the child view from point.
y - y offset that must be applied for the child view from point.
alignment - one or more alignment options to use

MapView.LayoutParams

public MapView.LayoutParams(int width,
                            int height,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int alignment)
Constructs LayoutParams instance with specified width, height, child view location and alignment options.

Parameters:
width - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
height - can either be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT or size in pixels.
x - the x location of child view relative to the MapView.
y - the y location of child view relative to the MapView.
alignment - one or more alignment options to use
